title: User without Prev Check-ins
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has NO prev check-ins
custom_steps: WHEN accessing My History on the Profile page via Home tab
custom_expected:
THEN My History page's display
AND the below validation is expected

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user without any prev check-ins is on the My History Page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown 'My History' as title 
AND user is shown '+' on top right
AND user is shown '- Check-ins', indicating no check-ins has occurred
AND user is shown a dash('-') above 'Teams' and 'Ballparks', indicating teams and ballparks has no data

AND user is shown a scrollable section view without any event card shown
AND a stadium image is shown 
AND 'No Games Added' shown bolded with subtext 'Be sure to check into games to add to your ballpark history.'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on dash above 'Teams'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN app does NOT respond as it is unable to open Teams page without data

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on dash above 'Ballparks'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN app does NOT respond as it is unable to open Ballparks page without data

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on '+' on top right
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Add a Game page to allow addition of Past Games attended

title: User with Prev Check-ins
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has prev check-ins
custom_steps: WHEN accessing My History on the Profile page via Home tab
custom_expected:
THEN My History page's display
AND the below validation is expected

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user with prev check-ins is on the My History Page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown 'My History' as title 
AND user is shown '+' on top right
AND user is shown a number prior to 'Check-ins', indicating the number of check-ins prev occurred
AND user is shown a number above 'Teams', indicating the number of teams associated with the check-ins
AND user is shown a number above 'Ballparks', indicating the number of ballparks associated with the check-ins

AND user is shown a scrollable section view of their prev check-ins (via individual event cards)
AND the events are sequentially organized, most recent season and most recent game
AND each event card shown at minimum has date, location, match-up (or title for NGE) and 'VIEW DETAILS' link
(teams, logos and score are shown, if event is a ballgame)
(notes and images are shown, if applicable)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user taps on the number above 'Teams' 
(keeping note of number tapped)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Teams page with:
* 'Teams' as title
* same number prev shown on My History page above 'Teams Seen', indicating the number of teams associated with the check-ins
* Win-Loss record and percentage above 'Home Team Record'
* dropdown selection for Team Records (Overall/Home/Away) and pertinent team data

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user back navigates to My History
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown 'My History' as title 
AND user is shown '+' on top right
AND user is shown a number prior to 'Check-ins', indicating the number of check-ins prev occurred
AND user is shown a number above 'Teams', indicating the number of teams associated with the check-ins
AND user is shown a number above 'Ballparks', indicating the number of ballparks associated with the check-ins

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user taps on the number above 'Ballparks' 
(keeping note of number tapped, and number of Check-ins)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Ballparks page with:
* 'Ballparks' as title
* same number prev shown on My History page above 'Ballparks', indicating the number of ballparks associated with the check-ins
* same number prev shown on My History page above 'Check-ins', indicating the number of prev check-ins
* pertinent Ballpark data for each ballpark (venue image, name, loc and visits count)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user back navigates to My History
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown 'My History' as title 
AND user is shown '+' on top right
AND user is shown a number prior to 'Check-ins', indicating the number of check-ins prev occurred
AND user is shown a number above 'Teams', indicating the number of teams associated with the check-ins
AND user is shown a number above 'Ballparks', indicating the number of ballparks associated with the check-ins

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls to bottom of page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all expected cards are shown, with last event card fully visible

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on '+' on top right
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Add a Game page to allow addition of Past Games attended

title: Teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app	
AND user has prev check-ins
custom_steps: WHEN accessing My History on the Profile page via Home tab
custom_expected:
THEN My History page's display
AND the below validation is expected

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user with prev check-ins is on the My History Page
AND taps on the number above 'Teams'
(keeping note of number tapped)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Teams page with 'Teams' as header and back navigation arrow to the left.

THEN the number of 'Teams Seen' is equal to the number shown on the My History Page
AND the same amount of entries(teams) are shown in the list-view with the team logo, location, team name, record and percentage shown for each
THEN the Home Team Record shows the Won-Loss record with percentage
THEN dropdown selection shown for Team Records with 'Overall Team Records' shown as default

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Overall Team Records' expander
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a bottom sheet modal appears with the three options:
* Overall Team Records (with a check to the right, indicating current selection)
* Home Team Records
* Away Team Records

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Overall Team Records' within the bottom sheet
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the bottom sheet modal is dismissed and the Team page is shown without any updates, since previous selection was 'Overall Team Records'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user taps on 'Overall Team Records' expander
AND user taps on 'Home Team Records' within the bottom sheet
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the bottom sheet modal is dismissed and the Team page is shown without any changes to 'Teams Seen' and 'Home Team Record

THEN 'Home Team Records' is shown as selected option
AND entries(teams) are shown in the list-view with the team logo, location, team name, record and percentage shown for each

(note the amount of entries shown may or may not equate to the number shown for Teams seen)
THEN the user is able to scroll down to see all teams that are not shown in the current view

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Home Team Records' expander
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a bottom sheet modal appears with the three options:
* Overall Team Records
* Home Team Records (with a check to the right, indicating current selection)
* Away Team Records

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Away Team Records' within the bottom sheet
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the bottom sheet modal is dismissed and the Team page is shown without any changes to 'Teams Seen' and 'Home Team Record'

THEN 'Away Team Records' is shown as selected option
AND entries(teams) are shown in the list-view with the team logo, location, team name, record and percentage shown for each

(note the amount of entries shown may or may not equate to the number shown for Teams seen)
THEN the user is able to scroll down to see all teams that are not shown in the current view

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Away Team Records' expander
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a bottom sheet modal appears with the three options:
* Overall Team Records
* Home Team Records
* Away Team Records (with a check to the right, indicating current selection)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'X' within the bottom sheet
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the bottom sheet modal is dismissed and the Team page is shown without any changes to 'Teams Seen', 'Home Team Record', NOR team list-view

title: Ballparks
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has prev check-ins
custom_steps: WHEN accessing My History on the Profile page via Home tab
custom_expected:
THEN My History page's display 
AND the below validation is expected

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user with prev check-ins is on the My History Page
AND taps on the number above 'Ballparks'
(keeping note of number tapped)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Ballparks page with 'Ballparks' as header and back navigation arrow to the left.

THEN the number of 'Ballparks' is equal to the number shown on the My History Page
AND the same amount of entries(Ballparks) are shown in the list-view with the ballpark image, ballpark name, location(city, state), and number of visits shown for each
AND the entries(Ballparks) are ordered by most attended venue
THEN the user is able to scroll down to see all ballparks that are not shown in the current view

title: Event Card Notes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has prev check-ins

WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225710/04+My+History+Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to My History page (via Profile)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MY History page displays all the check Ins

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views a previously check-in event card WITHOUT notes
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user had not added Notes 
AND the card shows this section collapsed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views a previously check-in event card WITH Notes
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the check-in event has Notes shown

title: Event Card Check-In Indicator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has prev check-ins (LIVE and Historic)

WIKI:https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225710/04+My+History+Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to My History page (via Profile)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MY History page displays all the check Ins

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user views a previously check-in event card that was added from a LIVE check-in 
(can occur with auto-checkin OR manual team tab checkin)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN event card displays an checkmark indicator next to the venue name signifying a LIVE check-in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user views a previously check-in event card that was added from a Historic check-in 
(can occur with '+' at top right)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN event card does NOT display an checkmark indicator next to the venue name signifying a LIVE check-in did NOT occur

title: Event Card  Non-Game Event(NGE)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has prev check-ins for a Non-Game Event(NGE)

WIKI : https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225710/04+My+History+Tab#id-04MyHistoryTab-MyHistory(mainscreen)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to My History page (via Profile)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MY History page displays all the check Ins

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views a previously check-in event card for a NonGame event
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN event card displays event date ("checkinDate" adjusted by timezone from UTC)
AND event card displays venue name (use string from service "venueName")
AND event card displays event name in the area where matchup/score is typically shown for games  (only use 1 line if the text fits, can use two lines if text does not fit in 1)
AND event card displays user's notes, if available (If user has not added comments, collapse this section)
AND event card displays user's image, if available (If user has not added comments, collapse this section)

title: Game Event View Details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has prev check-ins for a game event

WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225710/04+My+History+Tab#id-04MyHistoryTab-MyHistory(mainscreen)
custom_expected: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/33235)                    ![](index.php?/attachments/get/33310)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has navigated to My History Page
AND use taps on "View Details" for a game event
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the event date in the top header in the form of "MMMM DD, YYYY"(i.e. September 20, 2020)
AND a "Edit" button to the right of it.

custom_steps_separated.content: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/33235)     ![](index.php?/attachments/get/33310)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND the app will display a game score view in either the CURRENT or HISTORICAL form.
*CURRENT displays the teams colors on each side in a trapezoid, and the scores in the center. The team logos and the team name should be on the right and left side, with the home team on the right.
*HISTORICAL displays a white background with the historical logos and team name on each side and the score in the middle in the form of "0 - 0"


(current is the check ins for the 2019 season and after; historical are for the 2018 season and prior)

AND the app will display event venue name and the venue location. 
AND a green checkmark on the right indicating if the check in is "official" or not (i.e. historic check ins are not official, only ones done with the check in view are official)

custom_steps_separated.content: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/33238)    ![](index.php?/attachments/get/33246)     ![](index.php?/attachments/get/33249)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display user's section, row, and seat if available. Hidden if all are empty strings.

AND the app will display user's notes, if available ("userCheckinText")

(section is collapsed if no the user notes added, as there is nothing to display)

AND each photo the user has associated with the check in is displayed. 

(section is collapsed if no the user photos added, as there is nothing to display)

AND a floating or static add photo button is present on the screen. 

(floating button shown, if multiple photos are already added)
AND a "View Game Wrap" button is displayed
AND a "Delete Game" button is displayed

title: NonGame Event View Details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has prev check-ins for a Non-Game Event(NGE)
custom_steps: This view is exactly the same as the [Game Event Details View](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/1237065&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=155371) other than the "Score" display is only text for an NGE.
custom_expected: [Sample NGE](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1heXd4EeRViyCzTFe-ZcBP0GztXAcSTz_/view?usp=sharing)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has navigated to My History Page
AND use taps on "View Details" for a NonGame Event(NGE)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the NGE details page is shown exactly like a Game Event entry except the step below.
THEN the app will display a NGE "Score" view which only has a title in large text.

title: Event Card - Add Photo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has prev check-ins
custom_expected: THEN Add photo button is shown

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has navigated to My History Page
AND use taps on "View Details" for a game event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN there should be an "+ Add Photos Button" just above the game wrap button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user taps the "+ Add Photos" button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an selection dialog should be presented with options to use the camera or photo gallery

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user selects the photo gallery button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the native photo gallery should be presented with the option to select multiple images

(Permissions may be presented and will need to be allowed)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects photo(s)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the selected photos should be added to the event

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user selects the camera button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the camera app should be presented

(Permissions may be presented and will need to be allowed)

Android 14 forces the user to choose which photos in their gallery they wish to extend access to BALLPARK.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13899910)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user takes a photo
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the captured photos should be added to the event

title: Event card - Photo Placeholders
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has prev check-ins with photos

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN you open up the my history details view for a game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN each photo should have a grey placeholder with an icon and loading indicator

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the photo download/upload fails
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a placeholder icon that indicates a failed download will take the place of the loading icon and the loading indicator will stop

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the photo download/upload is successful
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the photo will be displayed instead of the placeholder

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a photo is uploaded
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the same conditions for downloading photos above apply

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN you return to the main history screen after uploading photos are completed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN you should see the newly uploaded photos in the game card

title: Event Card - Show/Hide floating Upload Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has prev check-ins with photos
AND user has prev check-ins without photos

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the history details page is open, if the blue text button "+ Add New Photos" is OFF screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the blue, white text, floating button should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the history details page is open, if the blue text button "+ Add New Photos" is ON screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the blue, white text, floating button should NOT be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN scrolling on the details page, if the blue text button "+ Add New Photos" goes from being OFF screen to ON screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the blue, white text, floating button should fade OUT

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN scrolling on the details page, if the blue text button "+ Add New Photos" goes from being ON screen to OFF screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the blue, white text, floating button should fade IN

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the floating upload button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the same upload photo flow should be started

title: Full Screen Photo View - Delete Photo
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has at least one game in history with photos
custom_expected: THEN the photo should seen in his account with the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user taps on a photo that is finished loading
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the full screen photo view should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user taps the garbage can icon in the full screen photo view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be prompted to delete the photo

Android Modal:

Delete Photo? 
This photo will be permanently deleted. 

CANCEL DELETE CTA in Blue colot text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a tap on DELETE
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should be popped back to the event details screen and the photo should be removed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user confirms the photo deletion and the response is unsuccessful
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN (on Android) a dialog box should appear saying that the deletion failed
THEN (on iOS) a dialog box should appear saying the delete failed with the option to retry or cancel.

without Network on Android: 

Network Error 
This photo was not deleted. 
OK CTA

custom_steps_separated.content: (iOS ONLY) WHEN a user clicks retry to delete a photo deletion
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the dialog box is dismissed and the photo is either deleted successfully or fails and is taken back to step 3 or 4.

title: Testing App Permissions for Photo Uploads
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is able to load photo
custom_expected: THEN photo is successfully uploaded in his account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN app is freshly installed, WHEN gallery/camera is selected for photo upload
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Permission for external read storage should be prompted

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN permission is allowed for gallery/camera
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN gallery/camera is shown and permissions will not be prompted on subsequent gallery/camera selections.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN permission is denied for gallery/camera
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an alert should be shown that explains why permissions is needed and option to go to settings is shown.

title: Full Screen Photo View - Pinch to Zoom (iOS)
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in and has history with at least one photo uploaded. Navigate to the Full Screen Photo View in a details view of a check in.
custom_expected: THEN the background is all black with a full screen view of the photo. Pinching the photo resizes it. Also should be able to scroll around the photo if it is larger than the screen.

title: Edit Check In View
custom_preconds: The user has navigated into a My History Check In Detail View and then tapped the "Edit" button in the top right corner.
custom_steps: Areas of test include cancel and done actions, typing in SRS text field and user message text view and UI.
custom_expected:
Empty text fields and text view:                    With text in each field:

![](index.php?/attachments/get/33328)                ![](index.php?/attachments/get/33329)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps into any text field or view
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the keyboard appears, the user can enter or delete their text for each field..

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user reaches the character limit for a text field or view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user cannot type any more characters and no errors are shown.
Max Character Counts
Section: 100
Row: 5
Seat: 5
User Message: 1000

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the "Cancel" button (Android: and back button, iOS: and swipes down modal view)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the view is dismissed and the users changes are not saved.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the "Done" button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a loading view appears that says "Saving"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the request to save the user data is succuessful
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the view is dismissed and the users changes are saved and represented on the Details View.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the request fails
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN an alert is shown giving the user the option to retry or go back to the edit view.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/34100)

title: [iOS]Delete Button
custom_preconds:
Logged in as a user, navigate to My History -> Click on a Check In Card View -> Details View (may need to scroll down)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/34097)          ![](index.php?/attachments/get/34098)
custom_steps:
Tap the delete button to prompt an alert view to display.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/34099)
custom_expected:
Confirmation results in showing a loading view. Cancel dismisses alert view only.
On success, the view is dismissed and the check in is removed from the main history view (iOS: may take a couple seconds if the user has 100+, 200+ check ins)
On failure, a retry view is shown.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/34101)

title: [Android]Delete Button
custom_preconds: Logged in as a user, navigate to My History -> Click on a Check In Card View -> Details View (may need to scroll down)
custom_steps: Tap the delete button to prompt an alert view to display.
custom_expected:
Confirmation results in dismissal back to the main history screen if the call to delete succeeds. Cancel dismisses alert view only.

On success, the view is dismissed and the check in is removed from the main history view

title: Historic check-in display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
custom_steps: WHEN accessing My History on the Profile page via Home tab
custom_expected:
THEN My History page's display 
AND the below validation is expected

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is on the My History Page
AND taps on '+' shown on top right corner
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Add a Game page to allow addition of Past Games attended

THEN user is shown the Add a Game page with 'My History | Add a Game' as header 
AND a dismiss 'X' to the left of the header
AND a refresh icon to the right of the header

THEN 'Add Past Games' label is shown
AND '* Required' label is shown
AND 'Year*' dropdown is shown and highlighted for input
AND 'Home Team *' dropdown is shown
AND 'Away Team' dropdown is shown
AND 'Month' dropdown is shown
AND further down on the page the following text is shown: "You will not be eligible to receive any offers or promotions related to past games. Check into live games to receive available offers and promotions."
AND 'Find Your Game' button in blue color is shown at the button of the page, but disabled until the required fields have inputs

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Year*' dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a modal page is shown with 'Year*' at the top of the list with a selected radio button on the right 
AND there is an entry for each years from current year(2021) to 1900 as radio options in reverse sequential order
THEN the user is able to scroll down to see all years that are not shown in the current view

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Year*' radio option (already selected)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is returned to the Add a Game page with 'Year* shown and 'Home Team*' highlighted for input

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Home Team*' dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a modal page is shown with 'Home Team*' at the top of the list with a selected radio button on the right 
AND there is an entry for each team (location and team name) as radio options in alphabetical order

THEN the user is able to scroll down to see all years that are not shown in the current view
AND the user sees the last two entries of 'American League All-Stars' and 'National League All-Stars'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Home Team*' radio option (already selected)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is returned to the Add a Game page with 'Year* shown and 'Home Team*' highlighted for input

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Away Team' dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN nothing is changed, as the dropdown is only enabled after making required selections

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Month' dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN nothing is changed, as the dropdown is only enabled after making required selections

title: Historic check-in to game in the Future
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
custom_steps: WHEN accessing My History on the Profile page via Home tab
custom_expected:
THEN My History page's display 
AND the below validation is expected

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is on the My History Page
AND taps on '+' shown on top right corner

title: Historic check-in to game in the Past
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
custom_steps: WHEN accessing My History on the Profile page via Home tab
custom_expected:
THEN My History page's display
AND the below validation is expected

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is on the My History Page
AND taps on '+' shown on top right corner
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Add a Game page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user taps on 'Year*' dropdown and picks the any previous year
AND user taps on 'Home Team*' dropdown and picks any team
AND user taps on 'Month' dropdown and picks any month
(note: 2020 didn't have any games in April/May/June)
AND taps on 'Find Your Game' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Add a Game page
AND '< Back to Search' underneath the header
AND a label underneath with the month and year previously selected
AND a list-view with all games meeting the criteria
AND each entry has day of the week and date on the left, with the team names(i.e Marlins @ Braves) with team logos directly to left of the team name
And a '+' on the right for any games user has not previously checked-in OR a badge for any games user has previously checked-in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on '+' on the game desired to be checked into
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Add a Game page
AND '< Back to Results' underneath the header
AND the expected match up with team logos(visiting logo on left and home logo on the right) , team names(i.e Marlins @ Braves), date and ballpark
AND 'What happened at the ballpark?' text as input field
AND 'Where did you sit?' text followed by 'Section', 'Row', 'Seat' text as input fields
AND a 'Save' button

custom_steps_separated.content:
When user fills out details in 'What happened at the ballpark?' input field
AND user fills out 'Section', 'Row', 'Seat' input fields
AND taps 'Save' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown the Add a Game page
AND 'You have successfully added this game!' is shown
AND 'Add Another Game' button with background blue color and white text is shown
AND 'Or' is shown followed by 'Go Back to My History' button with background white color and blue text is shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Add Another Game' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Add a Game page with Add Past Games dropdowns

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user inputs the desired parameters(Add Past Games dropdowns) for another search
AND taps on 'Find Your Game' button

THEN user is shown the Add a Game page

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to Home Tab

title: [Android] Event Details Deeplink [internal - (HomePage context card)]
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6133

As a fan who loves My History, I want to able to conveniently add content to the event I logged today


GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.5 or greater)
AND the user has access to a CTA deeplink particular to a specific event previously checked-in on their account (internal to BP app - such as a Context card on the HomePage)

Acct: bparkdev@gmail.com
Deeplink: ballpark://myhistory?eventID=632826
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on the CTA (deeplink)
custom_expected:
THEN user will be taken to My History top level view with the latest data from history service for the provided eventID
AND Back navigating from the history event details page should direct user to My History page (user will need to back nav again to return to Home page, bypassing My Profile page)

(Noting: iOS directs user directly to home tab)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Ballpark app is open
AND user is logged in
AND user accesses deeplink with an eventID prev check-in on the acct
(ballpark://myhistory?eventID=632826)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will be taken to My History Event details page of the provided eventID

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user back navigates from the My History Event page (either via back arrow at the top of the page or via device arrow at the bottom)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to My History page
AND Home tab is highlighted in the bottom navigation bar

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on back navigation on My History page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken My Profile Page
AND Home tab is highlighted in the bottom navigation bar

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Ballpark app is open
AND user is logged in
AND user accesses deeplink with an eventID prev check-in on the acct (but not the latest check-in)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will be taken to My History top level view with the latest data from history service for the provided eventID

(ensuring deeplink to non-latest event behaves)
